NHS: Try walking 10 minutes a day - at home or outside - Public Health England
Writing a "to do" list for the next day before bed can organise your thoughts and clear your mind of any distraction - NHS.
Try new hobbies that challenge you such as writing a blog taking up a new sport or learning to paint - NHS
Try do small acts of kindness towards other people or larger ones like volunteering in your local community - NHS
Mindfulness: Reminding yourself to take notice of your thoughts  feelings  body sensations and the world around you is the first step to mindfulness.
